data.current_summary: Get the details of a specified marketing email.
data.current_description: Get the details for a marketing email.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete details of a specified marketing email by ID. Returns a PublicEmail object containing email metadata, content, recipient information, testing details (if A/B test), and subscription settings. Use this operation to view email configuration, content, and associated statistics data before sending or making updates.
data.reasoning: The current description is redundant with the summary and lacks specificity about what data is returned. Added clarity about the response schema (PublicEmail), what fields are included, and practical use cases for AI agents to understand when to call this operation.

message: Operation 'delete-/marketing/v3/emails/{emailId}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_side_effects. The description is completely empty, providing no context for AI agents. Added information about permanence, constraints (not scheduled/in-flight), side effects (ID becomes inaccessible), and practical guidance on when to use this destructive operation.

data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes a marketing email by ID. This operation removes the email from the system and cannot be undone. The email must not be currently scheduled or in-flight. After deletion, the email ID will no longer be accessible. Use this operation to remove unwanted or obsolete marketing emails from your account.
data.reasoning: The description is completely empty, providing no context for AI agents. Added information about permanence, constraints (not scheduled/in-flight), side effects (ID becomes inaccessible), and practical guidance on when to use this destructive operation.

data.current_description: Change properties of a marketing email.
data.description_suggestion: Updates specified properties of an existing marketing email. Accepts an EmailUpdateRequest object containing the fields to modify (supports partial updates - only provided fields are changed). Returns the updated PublicEmail object with all current properties. Common updates include subject line, content, recipient lists, and subscription settings. Does not affect emails already sent or currently in-flight.

data.current_summary: Get the variation of a an A/B marketing email
data.current_description: This endpoint lets you obtain the variation of an A/B marketing email. If the email is variation A (master) it will return variation B (variant) and vice versa.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve the alternate A/B test email variation
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the alternate variation of an A/B test marketing email. If the specified email is variation A (master), returns variation B (variant), and vice versa. Returns the PublicEmail object containing the alternate variation's complete configuration and content. Requires the emailId parameter to identify the source variation.
data.reasoning: Summary has a typo ('a an') and is slightly unclear about the retrieval action. Description explains the logic well but lacks explicit information about the return type (PublicEmail schema) and parameter requirements. data.current_description: Resets the draft back to a copy of the live object.
data.summary_suggestion: Reset email draft to published version
data.description_suggestion: Resets the draft version of a marketing email to match the currently published (live) version. Any unsaved changes in the draft are discarded and replaced with the live version's content. Returns the reset draft email object. This operation is useful when you want to abandon draft changes and start fresh from the published state.
data.reasoning: Summary is too generic and lacks action context. Description is vague about what 'live object' means and doesn't explain the side effect (unsaved changes are lost) or return value. Enhanced summary with domain context and expanded description to clarify the operation's purpose, side effects, and return value for AI agent clarity.

data.current_summary: Restore a revision of a marketing email
data.current_description: Restores a previous revision of a marketing email. The current revision becomes old, and the restored revision is given a new version number.
data.description_suggestion: Restore a previous revision of a marketing email as the current live version. The previously active revision is archived with its version history preserved, and the restored revision receives a new version number. Returns the restored email object with updated metadata.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description explains the state change but lacks clarity on what is returned and the complete side effects. Enhanced description to clarify that the operation returns the restored email object, that version history is preserved (not deleted), and that this creates a new version entry for audit purposes.
